Description: Savola Group (known as: Savola) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Savola operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. It has Companies operating across the Carribian, Northern Africa and Middle East. Savola is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1979.

Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
